info.title: DonkeySEO
info.description: Keyword research backend service with a 14-step pipeline for programmatic content planning

post.description: Refresh access token using refresh token.
Create a new keyword research project.

get.description: List all projects for the current user.
Get a specific project by ID.

post.description: Start a new pipeline run for a project.

get.description: List pipeline runs for a project.

schema.title: Response List Pipeline Runs Api V1 Pipeline  Project Id  Runs Get

get.description: Get real-time progress for a pipeline run.

schema.title: Response Pause Pipeline Api V1 Pipeline  Project Id  Pause Post
Response Resume Pipeline Api V1 Pipeline  Project Id  Resume Post

get.description: List keywords for a project with filters.

post.description: Manually add a keyword to a project.

schema.title: Response Bulk Update Keywords Api V1 Keywords  Project Id  Bulk Update Post
Response Get Ranked Topics Api V1 Topics  Project Id  Ranked Get
Response Get Topic Hierarchy Api V1 Topics  Project Id  Hierarchy Get

get.description: List content briefs for a project.
Get writer instructions for a brief.

schema.title: Response Get Writer Instructions Api V1 Content  Project Id  Briefs  Brief Id  Instructions Get
